Re Historical Volatilitythink Zimin has been hanging around the phull volume guy to much I think what he is trying to say is that you are calculating the historical vol correctly but to compare this historical vol to an implied vol from either the marketplace or as calculated by yourself there will be an underlying assumption of a calendar year as the basis for option maturity Therefore you would have to use the sqrt of in order to make a comparison to the historical vol

FW FW MindblowingPST Original Message From Tami Eric and Jake Moon ENRON Sent Tuesday November AM To Shantell DeHaven Papa Kristin Rollins Julie Turner Jones Penny Jamie Moon Eric Granny Gram and Gramp Frank Jimenez Curtis Dena Day Aunt Jackie Subject Fw FW Mindblowing Subject FW Mindblowing Very interestingmake sure you read it Subject Remember At a UNC lecture the other day they played a video of Oliver North during the IranContra deals during the Reagan administration There was Olie in front of God and Country getting the third degree But what he said was stunning He was being drilled by some senator who asked him Did you not recently spend close to for a home security system Oliver replied Yes I did sir The senator continued trying to get a laugh out of the audience Isnt this just a little excessive No sir continued Oliver No And why not Because the life of my family and I were threatened Threatened By whom By a terrorist sir Terrorist What terrorist could possibly scare you that much His name is Osama bin Laden At this point the senator tried to repeat the name but couldnt pronounce it which most people back then probably couldnt A couple of people laughed at the attempt Then the senator continued Why are you so afraid of this man Because sir he is the most evil person alive that I know of And what do you recommend we do about him If it were me I would recommend an assassin team be formed to eliminate him and his men from the face of the earth The senator disagreed with this approach and that was all they showed of the clip Its scary when you think years ago the government was aware of Osama bin Laden and his potential threat to the security of the world I guess like all great tyrants they start small but if left untended spread like the virus they truly are Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp ATThtm ATThtm

FW the old man the kidOriginal Message From Tami Eric and Jake Moon ENRON Sent Monday November PM To UndisclosedRecipientpimoutintprodigynet Subject Fw the old man the kid Now this is funny An old man was sitting on a bench at the mall A young man walked up to the bench and sat down He had spiked hair in all different colors green red orange blue and yellow The old man just stared Every time the young man looked the old man was staring The young man finally said sarcastically Whats the matter old timer never done anything wild in your life Without batting an eye the old man replied Got drunk once and had sex with a parrot I was just wondering if you were my son Fwd the old man the kid MessageID From To Subject Fwd the old man the kid Date Tue Nov XMailer Internet Mail Service MessageID cdfeff yndi From cynphil To Penny Wierzbicki Ann and Ralph Weedon JULIE SCHNEIDER Tracey Charles Rossow MaryEllen Price Dede Nelson Jim and Margarett Mendenhall Joyce Malatinsky Pennie Kelley grandmagreat Claudine Gitchell CeegeeWebtvnet Mike Amy Gard Bob Gard Dave and Neela Coe buti Victor Bella Sosimo Aparis Subject the old man the kid Date Tue Nov XMailer Internet Mail Service An old man was sitting on a bench at the mall A young man walked up to the bench and sat down He had spiked hair in all different colors green red orange blue and yellow The old man just stared Every time the young man looked the old man was staring The young man finally said sarcastically Whats the matter old timer never done anything wild in your life Without batting an eye the old man replied Got drunk once and had sex with a parrot I was just wondering if you were my son

FW New PetOriginal Message From Tami Eric and Jake Moon ENRON Sent Tuesday November AM To Susanne ellcom Shantell DeHaven Papa Jamie Moon Eric Granny Gram and Gramp Frank Jimenez Aunt Jackie Aimee DormanPeters Subject Fw New Pet A NEW PET This guy was lonely and decided life would be more fun if he had a pet So he went to the pet store and told the owner that he wanted to buy an unusual pet After some discussion he finally bought a centipede which came in a little white box to use for his house He took the box back home found a good location for the box and decided he would start off by taking his new pet to the bar to have a drink So he asked the centipede in the box Would you like to go to Franks with me and have a beer But there was no answer from his new pet This bothered him a bit but he waited a few minutes and then asked him again How about going to the bar and having a drink with me But again there was no answer from his new friend and pet So he waited a few minutes more thinking about the situation He decided to ask him one more time this time putting his face up against the centipedes house and shouting Hey in there Would you like to go to Franks place and have a drink with me A little voice came out of the box I heard you the first time Im putting on my fucking shoes

Re Historical VolatilityPST I think Zimin has been hanging around the phull volume guy to much I think what he is trying to say is that you are calculating the historical vol correctly but to compare this historical vol to an implied vol from either the marketplace or as calculated by yourself there will be an underlying assumption of a calendar year as the basis for option maturity Therefore you would have to use the sqrt of in order to make a comparison to the historical vol

Re Cage Termination Amount by Dealare the values for Cage Gas Services by Deal DEAL VALUE N N NB TOTAL edm Forwarded by Eric MoonHOUECT on PM From Debbie R Brackett PM To Dan J CT cc Russell CT Eric CT Lisa CT Subject Re Cage Termination Amount Ive spoken with Eric Moon who provided Russell with the termination payment amount he has agreed to breakdown the numbers by transaction He will send it over to us as soon as possible Dan J Hyvl PM To Debbie R CT cc Subject Cage Termination Amount Debbie Lisa Mellencamp has requested that we include our summary calculation for each Transaction being terminated separately and specify the Deficiency Payment Amount for the period of non performance to the date of determination I believe that Russell previously stated that we terminated the Transactions effective as of For that reason why are the amounts broken out for and term She also wants to know what rate of interest are we demanding from the Termination Date Once I have the above information I will send the attached letter as modified for the above Forwarded by Dan J HyvlHOUECT on PM Russell Diamond AM To Debbie R CT Lisa CT Dan J CT cc William S CT Brant CT Tom CT Subject Cage Termination Amount Debbie Below is the termination payment as calculated by the Structuring group This is the amount we should use when notifying Cage of their payment owed ENA I think we should send a letter out to them with the amount owed to ENA I do not know if it is necessary to mention the draw on the LC which we have received Thanks Russell Forwarded by Russell DiamondHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Eric Moon AM To Russell CT cc Subject Russell The costs for the Cage Gas Transaction are outlined below June June June June June July End of Deals TOTAL COST edm

Interconn Resources Cc Scott and Ed Per a minibook I ran as of w the one deal corrected that ENA had misbooked the value due to Enron should be Dec Dec This value is PVd at LIBOR not as requested by the counterparty The value does not include attorneys fees requested by Interconn of In addition Interconn would need to pay the November invoice due to Enron of approximately MM The final settlement will need to be approved by the Creditors Committee before Enron can agree to alleviate Interconn of their contractual obligations regardless if the settlement value is agreed upon by both counterparties Let me know if the counterparty has any further discrepancies with the value I calculated above Thanks emoon

RE Kennedy AmendmentPaul The language regarding the volumes still has the phrase up to implying the customer may own some put rights Can we remove that language and just say MMBtud etc emoon Original Message From Lucci Paul T Sent Wed PM To Tycholiz Barry Reitmeyer Jay Williams Jason R Credit Moon Eric Cc Subject FW Kennedy Amendment Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday October PM To Lucci Paul T Cc Tycholiz Barry Williams Jason R Credit Subject Kennedy Amendment Here is the latest Kennedy Amddoc

FW Kennedy OilOriginal Message From Harrison Tyrell Sent Friday October AM To Moon Eric Little Kelli Cc Whitt Mark Lucci Paul T Subject Kennedy Oil Eric This spreadsheet summarizes the pricing terms for the proposed Kennedy Oil transaction that we discussed earlier Also attached in the email below I have included a Discussion Document that Mark and Pual put together for the purpose of discussions with Kennedy It provides more specifics on the pricing and volume allocation if you desire Based on my calculations the d priced at NYMEX minus is roughly in the money and the d priced at NGPL MidCon minus is roughly in the money I will be out next week but Mark and Paul will keep you posted as to the expected close date and any changes in the deal terms Please give me a call today if you have any questions Thanks Tyrell Original Message From Lucci Paul T Sent Tuesday October AM To Whitt Mark Harrison Tyrell Subject Kennedy Oil

RE West Gas Origination Meeting Sept per Barry TycholizWhats the enertainment Original Message From Presas Jessica Sent Tuesday July PM To Ward Kim S Houston Miller Stephanie Polsky Phil Bronstein Mara Moon Eric Lucci Paul Staab Theresa Harrison Tyrell Fuller Dave Whitt Mark Cc Tycholiz Barry Subject West Gas Origination Meeting Sept per Barry Tycholiz Further to some recent conversations block off Sunday Sept and all day Monday Sept for a group offsite By invite you will be asked to participate in some offsite activities and business meetings in Denver All flight hotel travel meals and entertainment will be coordinated by Barry Tycholiz Booking of flights which will have you departing on Sunday am and arriving around in Denver have been coordinated by our group to keep control of the flight costs We should have you home early on Monday evening around pm We have been able to get some really low fares and I want to keep them that way All the Houston based staff plus Portland Fuller will come to Denver Please see Jessica regarding flight times and schedules A more formal agenda and list of topicspresenters will be sent to each of you in the next couple of days If there are any questions give me a call at BT

FW Longview Transport OptionsCharlespst Original Message From Miller Stephanie Sent Wednesday June PM To Moon Eric Polsky Phil Subject FW Longview Transport Options FYI This is the analysis Phil and I spoke about May be back tomorrow am Steph Original Message From Wente Laura Sent Tuesday June PM To Miller Stephanie Slaughter Jeff G Subject RE Longview Transport Options Hi Stephanie Thank you very much for the update scary as it sometimes sounds I know youre swamped but if we could review and talk about a synopsis of the gas options on Friday it would be very helpful I think that we should be prepared to talk to Chris and Jake early next week as it looks like a pretty high probability assuming we cant get there with Puget Mirant or Engage that we may need to step up to the Expansion Let us know what your schedule looks end of this week and early next Thanks very much Regards Laura Original Message From Miller Stephanie Sent Tuesday June PM To Wente Laura Slaughter Jeff G Subject Longview Transport Options Spoke with Kern today They are evaluating the economics of two expansion projects Rockies to Stanfield piggyback of displacement fix and across the Gorge Stanfield to I NWPLs least cost expansion of the Gorge is for roughly mmbtuday At the present time they plan to offer the cheap expansability to their existing shippers on June as Phase II of the displacement fix Existing customers will have days to decide While NWPL remains undecided about the timing of an expansion out of the Rockies the project has not yet disconnected from the displacement fix Current best guess on economics this is a moving target for Rockies expansion is in the low s plus s for Gorge and this excludes fuel Another option would be to use existing PGT capacity or participate in their binding open season to Stanfield and participate only in the Gorge project If we were ready we could force Kern into a Gorge expansion prior to June To drive the process we would need to be the anchor tennant and be subject to the outcome of an open season that could result in upward pressure on the rate I have asked Eric Moon to help analyze and map all of the options Hope to have something to send to you on Friday Regards
